asset.nameSection.summary.description: You can change the asset's name in this section. Use the provided input field to adjust it.
asset.someSettingSection.summary.descrip: Use this section to configure some setting
assetList.remove.confirm.title: Delete asset?
assetList.remove.confirm.text: Are you sure you want to delete {{assetName}} from your assets? This action cannot be undone.
assetList.removeSelected.confirm.title: Delete selected assets
assetList.removeSelected.confirm.text: Are you sure you want to delete { assetCount, plural, one{# asset} other{# assets} }? This action cannot be undone.
assetList.removeSelected.inProgress: Deleting { assetCount, plural, one{# asset} other{# assets} }
assetList.removeSelected.success: Deleted { assetCount, plural, one{# asset} other{# assets} }
assetList.saveReorder.confirm.title: Confirm Reordering
assetList.saveReorder.confirm.text.accou: You are currently viewing your account library. Reordering assets will affect all Display Groups. To change assets on a specific Display Group, please visit your Display Group Library. Do you still want to change the order?
assetList.saveReorder.confirm.text.withF: You currently have filters enabled. Any changes you make in this view will place the selected assets together as a group in your playlist. To change the order of individual assets, please remove your filter.
